title: Handshake (Light Skin Tone)
description: Represents a handshake between two individuals, signifying agreement, greeting, or a deal being made. This version specifically depicts a handshake with light skin tones.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the handshake emoji, specifically the light skin tone variation, depicts two hands meeting with a sense of warmth and agreement, rendered with Apple‚Äôs signature smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges. The subtle 3D shading and realistic lighting convey a feeling of trust and collaboration, making it a clear symbol of partnership, consent, or a successful negotiation. This rendition on Apple devices feels professional and approachable, ideal for sealing a deal or confirming a positive understanding.
